short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search Result Previews adds "page previews" into Google search result page. PRO version shows also PageRank of each search result.
short.sk: Zobrazí náhľad stránky + ikonku stránky vedľa každého výsledku vyhľadávania!
short.zh_CN: 在每个搜索结果旁边显示页面缩略图 + 网站图标

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
🔍 "Search Result Previews" shows you page previews (thumbnails) 📸 and favicons 🔥 next to each search result.
🔥 PRO version shows page previews with PageRank bar above 📈:
https://ko-fi.com/s/903f091296
🔐 Analyze links before you click them! Using right click / "Compute link PageRank" you can see rank and preview of the domain, AND even test the link with 🛡️ VirusTotal page.
🚦 Free version can show PageRank of current page in the tooltip icon badge (must be enabled in the settings).

⭐ Supported search pages:
- Google.com
- DuckDuckGo.com
- Bing.com
- Baidu.com
- and many others...

❤ Support independent developer and official friend of Addons!
👤 Juraj Mäsiar - https://blog.mozilla.org/addons/2020/06/15/Friend-Of-Add-ons-Juraj-Masiar/

☕ I'm addon developer since 2016. My goal is to build powerful extensions for your web-browser to make you more productive.
If you think I'm doing a good job, please donate :)
- Ko-Fi.com: https://ko-fi.com/fastaddons
- PayPal.Me: https://paypal.me/fastaddons/
- Patreon.com: https://www.patreon.com/fastaddons

💥 Your donation is my only income!
Thank you for supporting my work!

🔒 Privacy Policy:
https://github.com/fastaddons/SearchResultPreviews/blob/master/PRIVACY_POLICY.md

💌 Credits:
- I would like to thank Edward Ackroyd for helping me create this project, for supplying me with his huge image collection and for making his "SearchPreview" addon in the first place - making me (and many others) more productive over the years!
- PageRank is supplied by Open PageRank: https://www.domcop.com/openpagerank/what-is-openpagerank
- icons by Font Awesome: https://fontawesome.com/license
long.de,fr,pl,sk,uk,zh_CN:
ℹ NOTE: this is an official replacement for the "SearchPreview" extension by Edward Ackroyd, which is now discontinued: https://searchpreview.de/

🔍 "Search Result Previews" shows you page previews (thumbnails) 📸 and favicons 🔥 next to each search result.

⭐ Supported search engines:
- Google.com
- DuckDuckGo.com
- Bing.com
- Baidu.com
- and many others (and more will be added)

❤ Support independent developer and official friend of Addons!
Juraj Mäsiar - https://Blog.Mozilla.org/Addons/2020/06/15/Friend-Of-Add-ons-Juraj-Masiar/

☕ I'm addon developer since 2016. My goal is to build powerful extensions for your web-browser to make you more productive.
